title: Ticket #1663: condor_start setrlimit() based upon slot memory
description:
LIGO would like it that a starter, before it execs a job, could set an setrlimit() for the job based upon machine ad expressions like Memory and job ad expressions like LastHoldReason or Owner.

The reason is that they would want to normally enforce a memory limit for a job running on a slot, but if a job is of a certain class to weaken the memory limit so the job overcommits in the machine's memory, but runs properly.
